descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.picshare.ru/view/4573659/][img]http://www.picshare.ru/uploads/140528/9aG2jL3wI2_thumb.jpg[/img][/url]

[i][b]Light Elven Armor Retexture by Raven[/b][/i]

Original Mod Author - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2959649/?]newermind43[/url]
Original page mode - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34074/?]Light Elven Armor - UNP by NewerMind43[/url]

[b][i]Description[/i][/b]

This is retexture I made for mod Light Elven Retexture by Newermind 43. I redid the basic apparel, except for gloves and boots.
Packed file archive bsa, it is everything you need - fully stanadalone mod.

Thank you to everyone who downloads! Enjoy!

[b][i]Installation[/i][/b]

The file is packed in archive bsa, in it - everything that it is necessary for you. Download my file and connect it in NMM.
It is possible to create in any forge (look for in the section "Elven")
You will need leather and leather strips.

For uninstall simply remove the esp and bsa files.

[i][b]Permissions[/b][/i]

Publish with the written permission of the author - newermind43
Many thanks to the author for the development of modifications!

Publish and distribution of mod without permission of authors is forbidden

[i][b]Credits[/b][/i]

Bethesda - for creating Skyrim
newermind43 - for his amazing armors
hodilton - for a wonderful video) He got me thinking about what it would be necessary to alter even gloves and boots)

[i]All screenshots are also welcome to this mod, because I took them very little)
I also very much hope that you enjoy my work - with love, Raven ;)[/i]
